page.title: 09VILLAGE PLAYGROUP
page.content: {Belbroughton Playgroup}was established in 1970 to cater for the pre_school needs of the 3 to 4 year olds. The playgroup employs a{leader and then mothers operate a{rota}to assist the leader to run the group. As playgroup is{self_financing,}there are many fund_raising activities. The playgroup meets in a spare classroom at the{village school.}This helps the children in their introduction to school life. Playgroup daily activities are: {Manipulative play; Creative play; {Physical play; Imaginative play; use {of Natural Materials; Storiesand {Drama; Music. At present there are 24 children registered at playgroup. Some attend on one or two mornings, the older ones for 5 mornings.
